ygData.msgSnippet: This called for other measures. He transformed to his massive bot mode and sat down near Maxima. Joining his hands, he closed his eyes and focused on the spark

This called for other measures. He transformed to his massive bot mode
and sat down near Maxima. Joining his hands, he closed his eyes and
focused on the spark before him.

It was almost appeasing to feel her spark. She was calm right now,
free of any worry. He wished he could feel the same, but it was not
for him, at least not for now.

AzureBlade: Now you might hear me through your spark, do you? I am
AzureBlade and I am here should you need any help. You are wounded,
but somehow, not as bad as when I first sensed you.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> In a message dated 6/6/03 8:32:36 AM Central Daylight Time, 
> Proudwing500k@h... writes:
> 
> 
> > Seeing no one, the dragon focused again on his spark feelings to
> > detect the bot. He concentrated, again seeing the estranged spark, but
> > this time, there seemed to be a feeling of amazement too. Focusing
> > even more, he discovered its nature... a decepticon female warrior...
> > and he felt her location.
> > 
> > He got out of his trance and flew quickly to the sides of the wounded
> > bot. He lowered his head as a sign that he was not here for war, but
> > rather for help.
> > 
> > AzureBlade: You are wounded, are you not? If you can hear me, I am
> > here to help you.
> 
> Standing at the base of the waterfall. She gazed at him for a
moment, not in 
> confusion or awe, but in serenity. 
> 
> "Wounded?" she finally spoke. Her voice like as always, deep,
sophisticated 
> femme voice with a fine mix command & soft gentleness. 
> 
> Indeed, the waters she was in were healing her. Slowly, though. Her
wings 
> however, would be a while to repair or they will have to be replaced. 
> 
> She only stood there, gazing at the blue dragon.
